definition: band/belt/girdle/ribbon/tire/area/zone/region/CL:條|条[tiao2]/to wear/to carry/to take along/to bear (i.e. to have)/to lead/to bring/to look after/to raise

sentences.english: Conclusion The eye lesions of herpes zoster ophthalmicus were…
sentences.chinese: 結論眼部帶狀皰疹損害廣泛，及時正確治療十分重要。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the clinical efficacy of flashing-fire moxibustion for herpes zoster.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察閃火灸法治療帶狀皰疹的療效。

sentences.english: They are usually black colored and have the appearance of normal shingles .
sentences.chinese: 他們通常都是黑色，外觀正常的帶狀皰疹。

sentences.english: Objective To observe effects of dialectical nursing combined with blood-letting puncture and cupping on herpes zoster.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察辨證施護配合刺血拔罐治療帶狀皰疹的效果。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the clinical manifestation and treatment of herpes zoster ophthalmicus.
sentences.chinese: 目的瞭解眼部帶狀皰疹的臨牀表現及治療情況。

sentences.english: This article misdiagnoses to 1 example belt-shaped blister measles carries on the analysis, summarizes the experience.
sentences.chinese: 本文對1例帶狀皰疹誤診進行分析，總結經驗。

sentences.english: It was controversial of using glucocorticoid in the treatment of herpes zoster.
sentences.chinese: 糖皮質激素用於帶狀皰疹的治療曾一度存在着爭議。

sentences.english: Objective To study the clinical characteristics of herpes zoster and to compare the cell-mediated immune function of patients.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討帶狀皰疹的臨牀特徵及細胞免疫功能。

sentences.english: Shingles, slates, and branches are blown off.
sentences.chinese: 帶狀皰疹，板岩，和分支吹走。

sentences.english: The different therapy was used for deferent parts of herpes zoster .
sentences.chinese: 不同部位的帶狀皰疹應用不同療法。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the clinical efficacy of blood-letting puncture and cupping for treating acute herpes zoster.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察刺絡拔罐治療急性期帶狀皰疹的臨牀療效。

sentences.english: Objective to evaluate the clinical effect of Longdan Xiegan decoction modified fast treating sudden-onset herpes zoster.
sentences.chinese: 目的臨牀龍膽瀉肝湯加減速治帶狀皰疹的療效。

sentences.english: Shingles (herpes zoster virus) is a painful viral infection of the nerve roots.
sentences.chinese: 帶狀皰疹是一種引起神經根疼痛的病毒感染。

sentences.english: Objective To study the effect of intradermic injection on the postherpetic neuralgia.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討皮內注射治療帶狀皰疹後神經痛的效果。

sentences.english: The different nerve block therapy was used for deferent parts of herpes zoster.
sentences.chinese: 不同部位的帶狀皰疹應用不同的神經阻滯治療方法。

sentences.english: And also a new research of anti-varicella-zoster virus drugs was reviewed, with looking into the future.
sentences.chinese: 展望治療水痘帶狀皰疹病毒的新藥研究前景。
